Description: Uncovered a JSON Web Token, which may lead to unauthorized access to web applications and sensitive user data.
Author: mk
Message:
feat(redaction): port secret detection engine from ntm

Add internal/redaction package with:
- 17 secret categories (13 from ntm + Notion, Slack, HuggingFace, Exa)
- 4 modes: off, warn, redact, block
- Deterministic placeholders [REDACTED:CATEGORY:hash8]
- Priority-based overlap deduplication
- Allowlist and disabled-category support
- ExtraPatterns for runtime-configurable detection
- Line/column enrichment for findings
- 20 tests passing including race detection

Ported from github.com/Dicklesworthstone/ntm/internal/redaction with
Demarch ecosystem additions. Pure stdlib, no external deps.

Bead: ntm-5is

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: mk
Message:
feat: add no-secrets-in-DB validation to state payloads

ValidatePayload now scans string values for common secret patterns
(API keys, tokens, JWTs, PEM keys, password assignments). Rejects
payloads that contain likely secrets with an actionable error message
guiding callers to store variable names instead.

Closes: iv-jdrt

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
